data.name: Soulbaby: Remastered
data.detailed_description:
An original rogue-lite experience combining bullet-hell and traditional, turn-based RPG elements. As a newfound hero, endure countless waves of enemies as you shape your identity, increasing performance attributes and learning new skills, on a journey to uncover the mystery of a fading cosmos.

Early Access Features

  • Unique turn-based, bullet-hell gameplay.
  • 50 Waves Of Challenging Enemies.
  • 7 unique projectile skills.
  • 5 unique defense abilities to strategies.
  • Enemies and bosses with randomly generated elements.
  • Gain experience and improve stats to your preferred play style.

data.short_description: An original roguelite experience combining bullet-hell and traditional, turn-based RPG elements. As a newfound hero, endure countless waves of enemies as you shape your identity, increasing performance attributes and learning new skills, on a journey to uncover the mystery of a fading cosmos.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or later
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
